metadata.synopsis: AD one liner that Aradin says when players attack klank while he is yelling at it, making him to join the fight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Attack Klank at Sorcerous Sundries while Aradin is near it, yelling.Location: CTY_Main_A 209; 24; 436

0.speaker: Aradin
0.text: All right! Time that old bucket got his due.
